properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 11 at 4:25PM EST until February 11 at 7:15PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a

* Flood Advisory for...
Central Habersham County in northeastern Georgia...

* Until 715 PM EST.

* At 419 PM EST, stream gauge on the Soque River at Georgia Highway
197 near Clarkesville reported minor flooding, with the water level
above Action Stage. The river has crested, and is falling, but
will not recede below its banks for another two to three hours.
Pitts City Park may still be flooded.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Clarkesville, Hollywood and Demorest.
properties.instruction:
Only when it is safe to do so, please report floodwaters or
landslides flowing over roads or threatening property to the National
Weather Service by calling toll-free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, by
posting on our Facebook page, or via Twitter using hashtag NWSGSP.
Your message should describe the event and the specific location
where it occurred, including roadways, nearby cross streets, stream
names, and other landmarks.
